testcase.name: Verify that user is able to create new coupon and delete once it got created.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigated to the Login page......................................passed When Enter Username "admin" and password "Admin@123"........................passed Then Home page should be displayed..........................................passed Given User is on coupon create page.........................................passed When Enter Coupon name "TestCoupon41" and Code "141"........................passed And Coupon should be created................................................passed And Select the created coupon and delete from the list......................passed
